name: Synology DS923+ NAS
image_prompt: Synology DS923+ NAS, black 4-bay enclosure, front drive trays visible, compact server design
description: Powerful 4-bay NAS with AMD Ryzen R1600 CPU and 4GB ECC RAM. Features Synology DSM, Docker support, hardware transcoding, and dual M.2 NVMe cache slots. Expandable to 9 bays.

reviews.review_text: DSM is the best NAS OS. Docker containers run flawlessly.
Perfect for my home lab and Time Machine backups.
Wish it came with more RAM but easy to upgrade.
